headline: BTIG downgrades Affirm, PROG Holdings on credit risks
summary: Investing.com -- BTIG downgraded shares of Affirm and PROG Holdings ahead of second-quarter earnings, flagging concerns over weakening credit trends and increased competition from traditional lenders. Brokerage upgraded Bread Financial and Synchrony Financial (NYSE:SYF) to Buy, and lifted Ally Financial (NYSE:ALLY) to Neutral from Sell given a more stable fundamentals and a shift in industry dynamics.
